pageContext.claim: “The Taliban has never been hit harder than it is being hit right now. Killing 12 people, including one great American soldier, was not a good idea. There are much better ways to set up a negotiation. The Taliban knows they made a big mistake, and they have no idea how to recover!”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. The Taliban was stripped from power when the U.S. first invaded Afghanistan 18 years ago.
